  1 package com.bbgz.android.app.adapter;
  2 
  3 import java.text.DecimalFormat;
  4 
  5 import android.content.Context;
  6 import android.content.Intent;
  7 import android.graphics.Bitmap;
  8 import android.graphics.Paint;
  9 import android.view.View;
 10 import android.view.ViewGroup;
 11 import android.widget.ImageView;
 12 import android.widget.RelativeLayout;
 13 import android.widget.TextView;
 14 
 15 import com.android.volley.Request;
 16 import com.android.volley.VolleyError;
 17 import com.android.volley.toolbox.Volley;
 18 import com.bbgz.android.app.C;
 19 import com.bbgz.android.app.R;
 20 import com.bbgz.android.app.bean.CommonListBean;
 21 import com.bbgz.android.app.net.BBGZNetParams;
 22 import com.bbgz.android.app.net.BBGZRequest;
 23 import com.bbgz.android.app.net.NI;
 24 import com.bbgz.android.app.ui.CommodityActivity;
 25 import com.bbgz.android.app.ui.LoginActivity;
 26 import com.bbgz.android.app.utils.DigitalConverterUtil;
 27 import com.bbgz.android.app.utils.ImageUrlReplace;
 28 import com.bbgz.android.app.utils.LoginUserManagement;
 29 import com.bbgz.android.app.utils.NetWorkUtil;
 30 import com.bbgz.android.app.utils.UploadLogUtil;
 31 import com.google.gson.Gson;
 32 import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
 33 import com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException;
 34 import com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.DisplayImageOptions;
 35 import com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.ImageLoader;
 36 import com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.assist.FailReason;
 37 import com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.assist.ImageLoadingListener;
 38 import com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.assist.ImageScaleType;
 39 import com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.display.FadeInBitmapDisplayer;
 40 import com.umeng.analytics.MobclickAgent;
 41 import com.v1baobao.android.sdk.V1BaseAdapter;
 42 import com.v1baobao.android.sdk.utils.ToastAlone;
 43 
 44 import org.roboguice.shaded.goole.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
 45 
 46 /**
 47  * 通用列表适配器
 48  * @since 2014年11月17日15:39:32
 49  * @author shuanjinzhang
 50  *
 51  */
 52 public class CommonListAdapter extends V1BaseAdapter<CommonListBean> {
 53 	protected DisplayImageOptions listViewOptions;
 54 	private int paint=-1;
 55 	 protected DecimalFormat decimalFormat;
 56 	public CommonListAdapter(Context context) {
 57 		super(context);
 58 		listViewOptions = new DisplayImageOptions.Builder()
 59          .showImageOnLoading(R.drawable.icon_default)
 60          .showImageForEmptyUri(R.drawable.icon_default)
 61          .showImageOnFail(R.drawable.icon_default)
 62          .bitmapConfig(Bitmap.Config.RGB_565)
 63          .imageScaleType(ImageScaleType.EXACTLY)
 64          .cacheInMemory(true)
 65          .cacheOnDisc(true)
 66          .bitmapConfig(Bitmap.Config.RGB_565)
 67          .resetViewBeforeLoading(true)
 68          .displayer(new FadeInBitmapDisplayer(200))
 69          .build();
 70 		 decimalFormat = new DecimalFormat("0.00");
 71 	}
 72 	
 73 	@Override
 74 	public int getCount() {
 75 		if (null == datas || 0 == datas.size()) {
 76 			return 0;
 77 		}
 78 		return datas.size() / 2 + datas.size() % 2;
 79 	}
 80 
 81 	@Override
 82 	public View getView(final int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent) {
 83 		if (null == convertView) {
 84 			convertView = mInflater.inflate(R.layout.gv_item_goods, parent,
 85 					false);
 86 		}
 87 		// 商品主图
 88 		final ImageView imavPic1 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
 89 				R.id.imavPic1);
 90 		// 商品名字
 91 		TextView tvName1 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView, R.id.tvName1);
 92 		// 商品喜欢数目
 93 		final TextView tvLikeNum1 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
 94 				R.id.tvLikeNum1);
 95 		// 真实售价
 96 		TextView price1 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView, R.id.tvAddress1);
 97 		// 市场价格 被划掉的价格
 98 		TextView normal_price1 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
 99 				R.id.normal_price1);
100 		// 左边第一个区域
101 		RelativeLayout rlc1 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView, R.id.rlC1);
102 		// 喜欢icon
103 		final ImageView isLike1 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
104 				R.id.imavLikeFlag1);
105 		// 邮寄方式
106 		ImageView imavNationalFlag1 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
107 				R.id.imavNationalFlag1);
108 		// 国家名字
109 		 TextView tvNationalName1 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
110 		 R.id.tvNationalName1);
111 		// 喜欢icon
112 		// ImageView imavLikeFlag1 =
113 		// BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,R.id.imavLikeFlag1);
114 
115 		final ImageView imavPic2 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
116 				R.id.imavPic2);
117 		TextView tvName2 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView, R.id.tvName2);
118 		final TextView tvLikeNum2 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
119 				R.id.tvLikeNum2);
120 		TextView price2 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView, R.id.tvAddress2);
121 		TextView normal_price2 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
122 				R.id.normal_price2);
123 		RelativeLayout rlC2 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView, R.id.rlC2);
124 		final ImageView isLike2 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
125 				R.id.imavLikeFlag2);
126 		 ImageView imavNationalFlag2 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
127 		 R.id.imavNationalFlag2);
128 		 TextView tvNationalName2 = BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,
129 		 R.id.tvNationalName2);
130 		 
131 		 if(-1==paint){
132 			 paint = normal_price1.getPaint().getFlags();
133 		 }
134 		// ImageView imavLikeFlag2 =
135 		// BaseViewHolder.get(convertView,R.id.imavLikeFlag2);
136 
137 		int size = getDatas().size();
138 
139 		if ((position * 2) < size) {
140 			ImageLoader.getInstance().displayImage(
141                     ImageUrlReplace.replace(getItem(position * 2).imageurl), imavPic1,
142 					listViewOptions, new ImageLoadingListener() {
143 						@Override
144 						public void onLoadingStarted(String imageUri,
145 								View view) {
146 							imavPic1.setBackgroundResource(C.PollColors.drawables[(position * 2)
147 									% C.PollColors.count]);
148 						}
149 
150 						@Override
151 						public void onLoadingFailed(String imageUri,
152 								View view, FailReason failReason) {
153 
154 						}
155 
156 						@Override
157 						public void onLoadingComplete(String imageUri,
158 								View view, Bitmap loadedImage) {
159 							imavPic1.setBackgroundResource(R.drawable.pic_write);
160 						}
161 
162 						@Override
163 						public void onLoadingCancelled(String imageUri,
164 								View view) {
165 
166 						}
167 					});
168 			String currency_symbol;
169 			String currency_market_price;
170 			if("1".equals(getItem(position * 2).isOverSea)){
171 				normal_price1.getPaint().setFlags(Paint.STRIKE_THRU_TEXT_FLAG);
172 				imavNationalFlag1.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
173 				tvNationalName1.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
174 				imavNationalFlag1.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_baoshui_tag);
175 				tvNationalName1.setText("保税仓");
176 				currency_symbol = "￥";
177 				currency_market_price = getItem(position * 2).market_price;
178 			}else if("2".equals(getItem(position * 2).isOverSea)){
179 				imavNationalFlag1.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
180 				tvNationalName1.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
181 				normal_price1.getPaint().setFlags(paint);
182 				imavNationalFlag1.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_haiwai_tag);
183 				tvNationalName1.setText("海外仓");
184 				currency_symbol = getItem(position * 2).currency_symbol;
185 				currency_market_price = getItem(position * 2).currency_market_price;
186 			}else{
187 				normal_price1.getPaint().setFlags(Paint.STRIKE_THRU_TEXT_FLAG);
188 				currency_symbol = "￥";
189 				currency_market_price = getItem(position * 2).market_price;
190 				imavNationalFlag1.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
191 				tvNationalName1.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
192 			}
193 			
194 			tvName1.setText(getItem(position * 2).name);
195 			tvLikeNum1.setText(getItem(position * 2).likeNum);
196 			String s1, s2;
197 			s1 = getItem(position * 2).store_price;
198 			s2 = currency_market_price;
199 			price1.setText("￥"
200 					+ decimalFormat.format(DigitalConverterUtil
201 							.string2Double(s1)));
202 			normal_price1.setText(currency_symbol
203 					+ decimalFormat.format(DigitalConverterUtil
204 							.string2Double(s2)));
205 			
206 			// CountryInfoBean countryInfoBean = getItem(position *
207 			// 2).country_info;
208 			// if (null != countryInfoBean) {
209 			// ImageLoader.getInstance().displayImage(countryInfoBean.mobi_image_url,
210 			// imavNationalFlag1);
211 			// tvNationalName1.setText(countryInfoBean.name);
212 			// }
213 			if ("false".equals(getItem(position * 2).isLiked)) {
214 				isLike1.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_like_normal);
215 
216 			} else {
217 				isLike1.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_like_select);
218 			}
219 			isLike1.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
220 
221 				@Override
222 				public void onClick(View v) {
223 					if (!LoginUserManagement.isLogin()) {
224 						mContext.startActivity(new Intent(mContext,
225 								LoginActivity.class));
226 					} else {
227 						isLike1.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_like_select);
228 						addLove(getItem(position * 2), "true"
229 								.equals(getItem(position * 2).isLiked),
230 								tvLikeNum1);
231 					}
232 				}
233 			});
234 
235 			rlc1.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
236 
237 				@Override
238 				public void onClick(View v) {
239 					MobclickAgent.onEvent(mContext,
240 							C.UMeng.EVENT_goto_product_details_click,
241 							ImmutableMap.of(C.UMeng.KEY_click_num, "搜索"));
242 					Intent intent = new Intent(mContext,
243 							CommodityActivity.class);
244 					intent.putExtra("product_id",
245 							getItem(position * 2).product_id);
246 					mContext.startActivity(intent);
247 				}
248 			});
249 
250 			if ((position * 2 + 1) < size) {
251 
252 				rlC2.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
253 				ImageLoader.getInstance().displayImage(
254                         ImageUrlReplace.replace(getItem(position * 2 + 1).imageurl), imavPic2,
255 						listViewOptions, new ImageLoadingListener() {
256 							@Override
257 							public void onLoadingStarted(String imageUri,
258 									View view) {
259 								imavPic2.setBackgroundResource(C.PollColors.drawables[(position * 2 + 1)
260 										% C.PollColors.count]);
261 							}
262 
263 							@Override
264 							public void onLoadingFailed(String imageUri,
265 									View view, FailReason failReason) {
266 
267 							}
268 
269 							@Override
270 							public void onLoadingComplete(String imageUri,
271 									View view, Bitmap loadedImage) {
272 								imavPic2.setBackgroundResource(R.drawable.pic_write);
273 							}
274 
275 							@Override
276 							public void onLoadingCancelled(String imageUri,
277 									View view) {
278 
279 							}
280 						});
281 				String currency_symbol2;
282 				String currency_market_price2;
283 				if("1".equals(getItem(position * 2+1).isOverSea)){
284 					normal_price2.getPaint().setFlags(
285 							Paint.STRIKE_THRU_TEXT_FLAG);
286 					currency_symbol2 = "￥";
287 					currency_market_price2 = getItem(position * 2+1).market_price;
288 					imavNationalFlag2.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
289 					tvNationalName2.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
290 					imavNationalFlag2.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_baoshui_tag);
291 					tvNationalName2.setText("保税仓");
292 				}else if("2".equals(getItem(position * 2+1).isOverSea)){
293 					currency_symbol2 = getItem(position * 2+1).currency_symbol;
294 					currency_market_price2 = getItem(position * 2+1).currency_market_price;
295 					imavNationalFlag2.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
296 					tvNationalName2.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
297 					imavNationalFlag2.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_haiwai_tag);
298 					tvNationalName2.setText("海外仓");
299 					normal_price2.getPaint().setFlags(paint);
300 				}else{
301 					normal_price2.getPaint().setFlags(
302 							Paint.STRIKE_THRU_TEXT_FLAG);
303 					currency_symbol2 = "￥";
304 					currency_market_price2 = getItem(position * 2+1).market_price;
305 					imavNationalFlag2.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
306 					tvNationalName2.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
307 					
308 				}
309 				tvName2.setText(getItem(position * 2 + 1).name);
310 				tvLikeNum2.setText(getItem(position * 2 + 1).likeNum);
311 
312 				String s3, s4;
313 				s3 = getItem(position * 2 + 1).store_price;
314 				s4 = currency_market_price2;
315 				price2.setText("￥"
316 						+ decimalFormat.format(DigitalConverterUtil
317 								.string2Double(s3)));
318 				normal_price2.setText(currency_symbol2
319 						+ decimalFormat.format(DigitalConverterUtil
320 								.string2Double(s4)));
321 				// CountryInfoBean countryInfoBean2 = getItem(position *
322 				// 2+1).country_info;
323 				// if (null != countryInfoBean) {
324 				// ImageLoader.getInstance().displayImage(countryInfoBean2.mobi_image_url,
325 				// imavNationalFlag2);
326 				// tvNationalName2.setText(countryInfoBean2.name);
327 				// }
328 				if ("false".equals(getItem(position * 2 + 1).isLiked)) {
329 					isLike2.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_like_normal);
330 				} else {
331 					isLike2.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_like_select);
332 				}
333 
334 				isLike2.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
335 					@Override
336 					public void onClick(View v) {
337 						if (!LoginUserManagement.isLogin()) {
338 							mContext.startActivity(new Intent(mContext,
339 									LoginActivity.class));
340 						} else {
341 							isLike2.setImageResource(R.drawable.icon_like_select);
342 							addLove(getItem(position * 2 + 1),
343 									"true".equals(getItem(position * 2 + 1).isLiked),
344 									tvLikeNum2);
345 						}
346 					}
347 				});
348 
349 				rlC2.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
350 
351 					@Override
352 					public void onClick(View v) {
353 						MobclickAgent.onEvent(mContext,
354 								C.UMeng.EVENT_goto_product_details_click,
355 								ImmutableMap
356 										.of(C.UMeng.KEY_click_num, "搜索"));
357 						Intent intent = new Intent(mContext,
358 								CommodityActivity.class);
359 						intent.putExtra(
360 								"product_id",
361 						getItem(position * 2 + 1).product_id);
362 						mContext.startActivity(intent);
363 					}
364 				});
365 			} else {
366 				rlC2.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
367 			}
368 		}
369 		return convertView;
370 	}
371 	
372 	private void addLove(final CommonListBean pb, boolean islike, final TextView tv) {
373 		final BBGZNetParams params = new BBGZNetParams();
374 		if (!NetWorkUtil.isOnline(mContext)) {
375 			ToastAlone.show(mContext, "网络不好");
376 			return;
377 		}
378 		if (islike) {
379 			ToastAlone.show(mContext, "已收藏");
380 			return;
381 		}
382 		params.put("origin_id", pb.product_id);
383 		params.put("origin", "1");
384 
385 		BBGZRequest v1q = new BBGZRequest(Request.Method.POST,NI.My_Love_Add_love,
386 				params.getParams(), new BBGZRequest.CallBackListener() {
387 
388 					@Override
389 					public void onErrorResponse(VolleyError error) {
390 
391 					}
392 
393 					@Override
394 					public void onResponse(String response) {
395 						try {
396 							Gson gson = new Gson();
397 							JsonObject jsonObject = gson.fromJson(response,
398 									JsonObject.class);
399 							int code = jsonObject.get("code").getAsInt();
400 							if (C.GlobalConfig.SUCCESS_CODE == code) {
401 								String t = tv.getText().toString();
402 								try {
403 									int nu = Integer.parseInt(t) + 1;
404 									t = nu + "";
405 								} catch (Exception e) {
406 									e.printStackTrace();
407 								}
408 								pb.isLiked = "true";
409 								pb.likeNum = t;
410 								tv.setText(t);
411 								ToastAlone.show(mContext, "收藏成功");
412 							} else if (0 == code) {
413 								String msg = jsonObject.get("msg")
414 										.getAsString();
415 								ToastAlone.show(mContext, msg);
416 								UploadLogUtil.uploadV1BBInterfaceError(
417 										NI.My_Love_Add_love, url,
418 										params.toString(), msg);
419 							} else {
420 								ToastAlone.show(mContext, "其他问题");
421 								UploadLogUtil.uploadV1BBInterfaceError(
422 										NI.My_Love_Add_love, url,
423 										params.toString(), "其他问题");
424 							}
425 						} catch (JsonSyntaxException e) {
426 							ToastAlone.show(mContext, "数据解析错误");
427 							UploadLogUtil.uploadV1BBInterfaceError(
428 									NI.My_Love_Add_love, url,
429 									params.toString(), "数据解析异常");
430 							e.printStackTrace();
431 						} catch (Exception e) {
432 							e.printStackTrace();
433 							ToastAlone.show(mContext, "数据异常");
434 							UploadLogUtil.uploadV1BBInterfaceError(
435 									NI.My_Love_Add_love, url,
436 									params.toString(), "数据返回异常");
437 						}
438 					}
439 
440 					String url;
441 
442 					@Override
443 					public void returnUrl(String url) {
444 						this.url = url;
445 					}
446 				});
447 		Volley.newRequestQueue(mContext).add(v1q);
448 	}
449 
450 }

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll’s dedicated Help repository.
